metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35001 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.Description: Linux Kernel nftables Out-Of-Bounds Read/Write Vulnerability; nft_byteorderpoorly handled vm register contents when CAP_NET_ADMIN is in any user ornetwork namespace

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
